        public double areaOfTriangle​(int x1,
                             int y1,
                             int x2,
                             int y2,
                             int x3,
                             int y3)
        A utility function to calculate area of triangle formed by (x1, y1) (x2, y2) and (x3, y3)
        Parameters:
        x1 - The X coordinate of the first vertex
        y1 - The Y coordinate of the first vertex
        x2 - The X coordinate of the second vertex
        y2 - The Y coordinate of the second vertex
        x3 - The X coordinate of the third vertex
        y3 - The Y coordinate of the third vertex
        Returns:
        The area of the triangle

      • isInsideTriangle

        public boolean isInsideTriangle​(int x1,
                                int y1,
                                int x2,
                                int y2,
                                int x3,
                                int y3,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        A function to check whether point P(x, y) lies inside the triangle formed by A(x1, y1), B(x2, y2) and C(x3, y3). A method for shotgun
        Parameters:
        x1 - The X coordinate of the location where the player is shooting
        y1 - The Y coordinate of the location where the player is shooting
        x2 - The X coordinate of North-East and 2 squares away from the location where the player is shooting
        y2 - The Y coordinate of North-East and 2 squares away from the location where the player is shooting
        x3 - The X coordinate of North-West and 2 squares away from the location where the player is shooting
        y3 - The Y coordinate of North-West and 2 squares away from the location where the player is shooting
        x - The X coordinate of the actor that exist in the map
        y - The Y coordinate of the actor that exist in the map
        Returns:
        Boolean value whether the actor lies within the triangle area
